_header: Think on me and have in mind
_description: Appeal of Christ to Man his ‘Leman’ — two couplets

TCD319.Transcription:
Thynke on me and haue in myndehowe I to the haue be so kyndeAnd
                    loke thow neuer louer takeBut me that dyed for thy sake
TCD319.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.516.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
